Posts.Content: Hi Kit Kat,  I think that each of us is sometimes lost...  How are you?
Posts.Title: Hi would love someone to chat to I'm very lost and upset right now...

Posts.Content: Good evening everyone,  first I wanna say hello and sorry for my grammar.  I will try, but be honest, I'm not prefect in English language. So sorry :* At 12.07. I was diagnosed breast cancer. I'm 29 and I have two boys 7 and 3 years old.  Now they now,  Mummy is sick..   I was reading with my children lovely story" Mummy lump". At next Tuesday I will get results my second  biopsy about nodes.  I'm really scared,  at home I all the time talk : I'm strong, I never give up. We can do everything because we are together.  I see face my husband he is worried .  And I all the time think about my family.  STILL I CAN'T BELIVE WHAT'S HAPPEN.   Doctor told me we need remove whole my breast,  I said : it's OK,  it's just breast.  I can live without it...  Can you tell me how is look operation?  How long we need stay at hospital after surgery?  Thank you :*
Posts.Title: I'm new

Posts.Content: Aww thank you for quickly answer. Don't worry about tomorrow Everything will be fine.  We are a women we are strong .  I know sometimes is very hard and lot of stress. I will pray tonight about your health. Take care. xxx
Posts.Title: I'm new

Posts.Content: Thank you so much AnneH. xxx
